title: Successful lighting for video
creator_credit: ViT, Mik Parsons and Chris Wonsky
brief_description: This video emphasises the importance of lighting in successfully portraying the subject of a shot in a video. The areas covered include: contrast; quality; intensity; direction and colour.
description: This video emphasises the importance of lighting in successfully portraying the subject of a shot in a video. The areas covered include: contrast; quality; intensity; direction and colour.
